fields.field: Are you male or female?  Type F for female, and M for Male
Which village in the district will you be reporting from? Please respond ONLY with the name of your village.
fields.value: Ali kyaaloalo district iyakuuniaiyongemut? Tobongokkeekirokekonekyalo BON.

fields.field: Congratulations!!!! You are now a registered member of U-report! With U-report you can make a real difference.  Your Voice Matters.  From UNICEF.
fields.value: Ikitalakaritaiiyong!!! IraukonaiyongemembataUreport! KalotoomaUreport, ipedoriiyongakikeunakonikuap. Awoyaarkonaekoniporoto. Kania UNICEF.

fields.field: Welcome to U-report where you can SPEAK UP and BE HEARD on what is happening in your community . it is FREE
fields.value: Alakaraalomun U-report, neniipedoriaiy’ongakikeunekon toil kaalimorng’unaeya lore – ikong’in. Erai U-report SMS ng’oloelomunitnasimkonikong’in. UNICEF.

fields.field: How did you hear about U REPORT?
Its important to know which District you'll be reporting on so we can work together to try & resolve issues in your community!Reply ONLY with your district.
fields.value: Ejokalimoredistrictng’inaikeuniaiyongekoni toil. Kotereatopedothidaangakitiyaaiwapeiasukbakinng’akirong’unaeyainaa. Tobong’ok SMS logo keekirokeedistrictkon BON

fields.field: Best responses may be shared! Send us your name, or if you prefer a nickname so we can give you recognition for good replies in the media
fields.value: Emoring’abokinetakori SMS luajuwak! Kiyakuuekonkiro, keraibo lo ikimaitere dang, kotereikipedoriisuaakitilakariyongaloemuto.

fields.field: We didn't recognize your district.  Please carefully type the name of your district and re-send.
fields.value: Ejokalimoredistrictng’inaikeuniaiyongekoni toil. Kotereatopedothidaangakitiyaaiwapeiasukbakinng’akirong’unaeyainaa. Tobong’ok SMS logo keekirokeedistrictkon BON
